content:
As an AI language model, I do not have the ability to recommend specific places. However, Istanbul is known for having many restaurants and street vendors that serve delicious lamb kebabs. Here are a few popular spots to consider trying:

1. Kebapçı İskender: This restaurant in the Beyoğlu district is famous for its Iskender kebab, made with layers of marinated lamb and served with yogurt and butter sauce.

2. Şehzade Cag Kebap: Located in the Fatih district, this restaurant serves a variety of kebabs, including traditional lamb kebabs, grilled over hardwood charcoal.

3. Namlı Gurme: This popular food market in Istanbul offers an array of quality meats, including lamb, that you can purchase and grill at home to make your own kebabs.

4. Kebapçı Enver Usta: This cozy eatery in the Üsküdar district specializes in lamb kebabs, served with sides like grilled vegetables and fresh bread.

These are just a few examples, but there are plenty of other places in Istanbul where you can try delicious lamb kebabs.
